purpose: To facilitate the creation and deployment of real-time voice and video AI agents for interactive applications.
principle: Leverages OpenAI APIs and real-time communication protocols to process voice and video inputs for AI-driven interactions.
reusability: Offers modular components and APIs for seamless integration into existing systems, supports customization of agent behavior.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues and limited documentation for complex integrations.
name: agents
description: A powerful framework for building realtime voice AI agents 🤖🎙️📹
highlight: Enables real-time voice and video AI agent interactions with robust support for OpenAI integrations.
